Package io.crums.sldg.demo.jurno

Class JurnoMorselBuilder

java.lang.Object
io.crums.sldg.demo.jurno.JurnoMorselBuilder
public class JurnoMorselBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
Builds a morsel from a Journal.

Design Note

This builder uses a fixed DbMorselBuilder internally. It deliberately doesn't derive from it, so that there are fewer code paths to consider.

  • Method Details

    • addEntriesByLineNumber

      public int addEntriesByLineNumber​(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> lineNumbers) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException, HashConflictException
      Adds entries in canonical form for the given ledgered line numbers and returns the number of entries actually added.

      This method injects also injects any nearest beacon (row) or trailed row/crumtrail, if any. It also injects ledger rows that together with existing rows in the morsel complete a shortest path connectng all the above objects and the entry thru the highest row in the ledger. See also DbMorselBuilder.addEntry(long, ByteBuffer, String).

      Parameters:
      lineNumbers - (ledgerable) line numbers (already ledgered) in strictly ascending order
      Returns:
      the number entries added (zero, if the entries are already added)
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      HashConflictException

    • addEntriesByLineNumber

      public int addEntriesByLineNumber​(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> lineNumbers, boolean canonicalForm) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException, HashConflictException
      Adds entries for the given ledgered line numbers and returns the number of entries actually added.

      This method injects also injects any nearest beacon (row) or trailed row/crumtrail, if any. It also injects ledger rows that together with existing rows in the morsel complete a shortest path connectng all the above objects and the entry thru the highest row in the ledger. See also DbMorselBuilder.addEntry(long, ByteBuffer, String).

      Parameters:
      lineNumbers - (ledgerable) line numbers (already ledgered) in strictly ascending order
      canonicalForm - if true (the default) then each ledgerable line is first transformed into canonical form before being added to the morsel
      Returns:
      the number entries added (zero, if the entries are already added)
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      HashConflictException

    • createMorselFile

      public java.io.File createMorselFile​(java.io.File file) throws java.io.IOException
      Creates a new morsel file using the state of this instance.

      Auto Filename Generation

      TODO: document if this becomes a thing.

      Parameters:
      file - path to non-existent file (suggest .mrsl extension) or path to an existing directory (in which case a filename is generated on the fly).
      Returns:
      the morsel file
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException
